ValidationRule.description: The rule prohibits changing manually the ARR field when the opportunity has products.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( $User.User_ID_18_digits__c = "0053g000000htF8AAI"), NOT(Contains($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")), of_products_MRR__c > 0, ISCHANGED(ARR_manual__c), ROUND(ARR_manual__c, 2) <> ROUND(MRR_from_Products__c*12, 2) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please edit ARR by updating products.
